item.title: My LFX Mentorship Journey with CNCF: Kubernetes
item.description: I have always wanted to participate in the LFX Mentorship program and here I am, graduated, writing this blog. These 3 months were amazing! This blog covers my experience in this mentorship. What’s the LFX Mentorship? “The Linux Foundation Mentorship Program is designed to help developers — many of whom are first-time open source contributors — with necessary skills and resources to learn, experiment, and contribute effectively to open source communities.
